title: Border Fragment, late 17th–early 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin made continuous tape with net added
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border fragment of Point d'Angleterre à Réseau with a small-scale pattern of cupids, floral shapes and crowns. Fond: Droschel. Modes: portes, réseau mouché.
